channel.title: Some weird crash during "Loading" Screen
channel.description:
it didn't happen before but lately after chapter "Questionable Ethics" it happens all the time. Here is the crash: [url]https://imageshack.us/f/23/90734271.png/[/url]
I would really appreciate if u could help me. So far i love this mod :smiley: .
P.S: Fix the MP5 :wink:

item.title: Some weird crash during "Loading" Screen
item.dc:creator: COLON
item.description:
Other question: What’s your Steam-Skin?
Okay to your question:
Try sending your minidump-crash-file, located in your SDK Base 2007, it is helping the devs.

Read full topic
